sentences.english: The current galvanizing mill will be removed and the six-high mill will be built in its place.
sentences.chinese: 目前镀锌厂将被删除，将在其位置上兴建的六辊轧机。

sentences.english: The zinc nail and the copper penny are called electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 镀锌钉和铜硬币就是电池的电极。

sentences.english: Domestically, no cyanogen zinc acid salt galvanized is still the mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 就国内而言，无氰锌酸盐镀锌仍是主流。

sentences.english: It's obviously that corrosion-resistance and brightness are much better than those of Zn plating.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果表明，其耐蚀性和光亮度明显优于镀锌层。

sentences.english: The method has been applied in the determination of Zn2+in wastewater with a satisfactory result.
sentences.chinese: 应用该方法进行了镀锌废液中锌的测定，结果满意。

sentences.english: A mat final aspect was chosen for its resemblance to the colour of the zinc domes and pinnacles.
sentences.chinese: 地板最终选择与镀锌圆顶和尖塔相近的颜色。

sentences.english: Galvanized low carbon steel wire cloth?
A chromium-free phytic acid passivating coatings for galvanized parts is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对镀锌件植酸钝化膜进行了研究。

sentences.english: Secondary frame including purlins, doors frame… made of galvanized steel profiles.
sentences.chinese: 次钢构包括檩条，门框架等等，由镀锌钢型材料制作。

sentences.english: Material aluminium alloy , All parts are hot-dip galvanized steel.
sentences.chinese: 铝合金制件，热镀锌钢制件。

sentences.english: The steel ring will be stainless steel or zinc-plated.
sentences.chinese: 袋口圈可以有不锈钢圈，镀锌钢圈。

sentences.english: Exhaust air from rear side; galvanized steel molding frame, white coated steel cover.
sentences.chinese: 后部排风，镀锌板型材框架，白色彩钢板蒙板。

sentences.english: Castings and forgings and hydrogen brittleness sensitivity to the spare parts of the appropriate USES weak acid galvanizing.
sentences.chinese: 铸锻件和对氢脆敏感的零件宜用弱酸性镀锌液。

sentences.english: Each wire is galvanized and the cable is covered with a protective coating.
sentences.chinese: 每根钢丝进行了镀锌处理，悬索也要涂上防腐层。

sentences.english: Clamp body and kdeeper are aluminium , the other parts are hot-dip galvanized steel.
sentences.chinese: 线夹本体和抽匣为铝制件，其余为热镀锌钢制件。

sentences.english: Zinc-coated steel wires for stranded conductors.
